statement.p: Based on the table, what is the stall speed in a 37.5 degree turn with flaps in the Up position?
It is safest to round stall speeds to a higher speed. Round up to the nearest integer.

solution.p: First, we look in the top row (bank angles) to find the nearest values. Note that 37.5 is half way between 30 and 45.
The entries in the Up row for these two columns are 52 and 57.
To interpolate we average \displaystyle\frac{{{52}+{57}}}{{2}}={26}\approx{26}. We round up to be safe.
